buildPhases.description: Captures webinar signup data from landing page form submissions via webhook endpoint. This initiates the entire registration and follow-up automation process.
Processes signup data by generating calendar links for the webinar event. Prepares the data needed for confirmation emails and attendee management.
Sends confirmation email to registrants with webinar details and calendar link. Provides immediate acknowledgment of successful registration.
Adds new registrants to Mailchimp email list and creates/updates contact records in Zoho CRM. Ensures all attendee data is synchronized across marketing and sales systems.
Schedule-based trigger that activates reminder and follow-up email sequences at predetermined intervals before and after the webinar event.
Sends reminder emails to registered attendees and follow-up offers to those who attended. Maintains engagement throughout the webinar lifecycle and drives post-event conversions.

parameters.content:
##  Triggers
Captures webinar signup data from landing page form submissions via webhook endpoint. This initiates the entire registration and follow-up automation process.

Schedule-based trigger that activates reminder and follow-up email sequences at predetermined intervals before and after the webinar event.

##  Transform
Processes signup data by generating calendar links for the webinar event. Prepares the data needed for confirmation emails and attendee management.

##  Outputs
Sends confirmation email to registrants with webinar details and calendar link. Provides immediate acknowledgment of successful registration.

Sends reminder emails to registered attendees and follow-up offers to those who attended. Maintains engagement throughout the webinar lifecycle and drives post-event conversions.

##  Integration
Adds new registrants to Mailchimp email list and creates/updates contact records in Zoho CRM. Ensures all attendee data is synchronized across marketing and sales systems.

##  Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with  by Ghost Team.
